It is likely that SARS-CoV-2 is not the last human coronavirus emerging from animals. It is therefore important to closely monitor virus populations to understand their replication mechanism early on and investigate druggable targets. A sharp decline in research funding had been noted a few years after the first SARS epidemic.
61 Given the long-term nature of drug discovery projects, this has proven disastrous with respect to the current crisis. Now is the best time to progress protease inhibitors to anti-coronaviral drugs.
